PropertySetDef.Name: Pset_RailwaySignalSighting
PropertySetDef.Definition: Properties that define information about signal sighting or visibility in railways. These properties are applicable to occurrences of IfcSignal and IfcSign.

PropertyDef.Name: SignalSightingAchievableDistance
PropertyDef.Definition: Reading distance of the signal, which is achievable with the help of mitigation works.

PropertyDef.Name: SignalSightingAvailableDistance
PropertyDef.Definition: Reading distance of the signal without having any mitigation works.

PropertyDef.Name: SignalSightingCombinedWithRepeater
PropertyDef.Definition: Combined reading distance for the signal and any associated repeaters.

PropertyDef.Name: SignalSightingMinimum
PropertyDef.Definition: Minimal distance in which the signal has to be readable.

PropertyDef.Name: SignalSightingPreferred
PropertyDef.Definition: Preferred distance in which the signal shall be readable.

PropertyDef.Name: SignalSightingRouteIndicator
PropertyDef.Definition: Required reading distance for the route indicator.

PropertyDef.Name: SignalViewingMinimumInFront
PropertyDef.Definition: Smallest distance where the signal has to be readable (for train very close to the signal).
